oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Flooded Joe’s Crab Shack restaurant on Second Avenue South in downtown Nashville during the May 2010 flood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
A photograph of the flooded Joe’s Crab Shack restaurant on Second Avenue South in downtown Nashville during the May 2010 flood.
Forms part of the Nashville Room Flood 2010 Digital History Project.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville (Tenn.)--Floods;Nashville (Tenn.)--History--21st century;Broadway Avenue (Nashville, Tenn.);Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources;Cumberland River (Ky. and Tenn.);
